titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012. Modified by Dot Porter in 2017.

bioghist.p: Benjamin Dickstein (b. 1915) received his M.D. from the University of Pennsylvania in 1940. He was an intern at Jewish Hospital (now known as Albert Einstein Medical Center).

scopecontent.p: This is a collection of patient case files of Dr. Benjamin Dickstein. Files include a summary card with information on the patient, a data chart of pre- and post-operative lab results, and correspondence requesting to post-operative followup information from patients and physicians. Materials date from 1946 to 1965.

accessrestrict.p: Access to this collection is restricted; please contact the holding institution for details.
